nodes.text: Doctor Aphra 16 is the sixteenth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Doctor Aphra. The issue was written by Kieron Gillen and Si Spurrier, illustrated by Emilio Laiso, and published on January 31, 2018 by Marvel Comics. The issue contains the story "Remastered Part III," in which Doctor Aphra encounters Inspector Magna Tolvan.
Tensions are high in this galaxy far, far away for Doctor Aphra. She's got a new master holding her reins…and he's a Triple-threat. Also – Magna Tolvan. Friend or foe?!
